summary: Project involves deploying an app and updating it to include a provided logo image link.
known_issues: Build/deploy process encountered an internal configuration issue requiring Caffeine team support.

existing_features.title: Update the React marketing header brand mark to render the provided logo image from the URL "https://growithtutor.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/cropped-cropped-growithtutor-3d-new-logo-150x150.png" (instead of text-only), while keeping the existing click-to-navigate-home behavior and accessible labeling.

Update the React marketing footer brand mark to render the provided logo image from the URL "https://growithtutor.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/cropped-cropped-growithtutor-3d-new-logo-150x150.png" (instead of text-only), without changing the footerâ€™s existing links and content.
Update the Setup Checklist page so the "Logo" checklist item reflects that the logo is now configured via the provided external URL.

Update the standalone static marketing page (frontend/static/growwithtutor-standalone/index.html) so its header and footer brand marks also use the provided logo image URL instead of text-only, keeping the rest of the static page intact.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add/update the app to include the provided logo image link in the code during deployment

projectName: Add provided logo image URL to marketing header/footer branding
